name: io.github.jztan/redmine-mcp-server
description: Production-ready MCP server for Redmine with security, pagination, and enterprise features

environmentVariables.description: URL of your Redmine server (e.g., https://your-redmine-server.com)
environmentVariables.name: REDMINE_URL

environmentVariables.description: Redmine username for authentication (alternative to API key)
environmentVariables.name: REDMINE_USERNAME

environmentVariables.description: Redmine password for authentication (alternative to API key)
environmentVariables.name: REDMINE_PASSWORD

environmentVariables.description: Redmine API key for authentication (alternative to username/password)
environmentVariables.name: REDMINE_API_KEY

environmentVariables.description: Host address for the MCP server (default: 0.0.0.0)
environmentVariables.name: SERVER_HOST

environmentVariables.description: Public hostname for file download URLs (default: localhost)
environmentVariables.name: PUBLIC_HOST

environmentVariables.description: Public port for file download URLs (default: 8000)
environmentVariables.name: PUBLIC_PORT

environmentVariables.description: Enable automatic cleanup of expired files (default: true)
environmentVariables.name: AUTO_CLEANUP_ENABLED

environmentVariables.description: Interval between cleanup runs in minutes (default: 10)
environmentVariables.name: CLEANUP_INTERVAL_MINUTES

environmentVariables.description: Default expiry time for attachments in minutes (default: 60)
environmentVariables.name: ATTACHMENT_EXPIRES_MINUTES
